channel.title: [614]Need A Run Cmd Rep++
channel.description:
Okay, I need a run cmd script for my 614, as everytime i run it it does this:
[code=java5][17:29:39] [Server] Starting loading Cache... java.lang.NullPointerException at RuneExtream.rscache.CacheManager.load(CacheManager.java:18) at RuneExtream.rscache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:17) at RuneExtream.Server.<init>(Server.java:28) at RuneExtream.Server.main(Server.java:68) Press any key to continue . . .
[/code] This Is my current code: [code=java5] @echo off title RuneExtream Server java -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/netty-3.1.5.GA.jar RuneExtream.Server pause [/code] [size=14pt]If you GIVE me [i]Another[/i] Code That [i]Works[/i] I Will give rep++[/size]

item.title: [614]Need A Run Cmd Rep++
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

Soz i already found out

Read full topic

item.title: [614]Need A Run Cmd Rep++
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

This is the run.bat code for my 614 client:

@echo off title 614 QROOT Client java -cp bin;runescape.jar;clientlibs.jar;runescape.jar launch rs pause

and heres the one for the source of it:

@echo off title Running java -cp bin;lib/netty-3.1.5.GA.jar dragonkk.rs2rsps.Server pause

hope it helps

Read full topic

@ZioBotic wrote:

Okay, I need a run cmd script for my 614, as everytime i run it it does this:

[code=java5][17:29:39] [Server] Starting loading Cacheâ€¦
java.lang.NullPointerException
at RuneExtream.rscache.CacheManager.load(CacheManager.java:18)

This Is my current code:

title RuneExtream Server
java -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/netty-3.1.5.GA.jar RuneExtream.Server
pause
